name: Al-Fatiha
summary: This is the opening chapter of the Quran. It's a prayer for guidance, lordship and mercy of Allah. It emphasizes that the Quran is a guide to those who are conscious of God. Muslims recite this surah in every prayer.

name: Al-Baqara
summary: Prophet stories (ADAM (AS), SULAIMAN (A), DAWOOD(A), IBRAHIM(A), MUSA(AS), YAKUB (A)), Belief in Allah (ENT), Five Pillars, Rituals, History of pronous nations, ISLAMIC THEOLOGY, Quran Challenge. PROHIBITIONS Alcohol, Intrest, Gambling.

name: An-Nas
summary: Protection against the whisperings of Shaytan
